Eden_Prairie.Xtreme Swing:
Xtreme Swing is a thrill ride located at Valleyfair in Shakopee, Minnesota.


== Specifications ==
Xtreme Swing is a Screamin' Swing type ride built by S&S Worldwide. The structure itself is 100 feet (30 m) tall at its highest point, the equivalent height of a ten-story building, making it the world's second largest swinging thrill ride, Skyhawk at Cedar Point being the largest.
